article.title: Argon ST Receives $5.3 Million in OT-TES Communications Upgrade Awards for Additional Pre-Production Activities
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Argon ST has been awarded two contract modifications by the U.S. Army's Program Executive Office for Simulation, Training and Instrumentation to support pre-production activities of the Operational Test-Tactical Engagement System (OT-TES) Communication Upgrade program. The contract modifications are valued at approximately $5.3 million.
